==German== {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ===Etymology=== From {{affix|de|Schüler|-in}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʃyːləʁɪn/}} * {{audio|de|De-Schülerin.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f||Schülerinnen|m=Schüler}} # {{lb|de|school}} a female [[pupil]], [[student]] or [[schoolgirl]] # a female [[disciple]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|nen}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|Mitschüler|g=m}}, {{l|de|Mitschülerin|g=f}} * {{l|de|Schülersprecher|g=m}}, {{l|de|Schülersprecherin|g=f}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} {{topics|de|Children|Female}}
